column4: Can someone help me debug my wifi connection? I am connected, there is reception - but the internet is not stable... for a short period i can ping google in about 40ms and then without reason it shoots up to beyond 3000ms... i just don't know what's wrong...
you can look that up using ifconfig
i know the ip of the router... if that's what you mean
the router *is* your gateway (apart from a complex network setup, that is)
